ISSUE.TITLE: Exception User-Unhandled
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Steps to reproduce the problem: Logout from Administrator account,it will through Exception from "EuCookieLaw.cs" from below method public IViewComponentResult Invoke() //ignore notification? //right now it's used during logout so popup window is not displayed twice if (TempData[$"{NopCookieDefaults.Prefix}{NopCookieDefaults.IgnoreEuCookieLawWarning}"] != null && Convert.ToBoolean($"{NopCookieDefaults.Prefix}{NopCookieDefaults.IgnoreEuCookieLawWarning}")) System.FormatException: 'String was not recognized as a valid Boolean.'

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3642 Fixed problem with throwing "System.FormatException" exception on logout process
